segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is waiting for her share, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but the woman remains calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s used to this kind of thing happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, but she’s just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to get his cookie, and the girl is going to be happy too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be surprised when she finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but they’re also being clever.
segments.speaker: PAR
